sprykerComponent.name: suggestion-product
sprykerComponent.readme:
Displays a short description of an item card with image, name, and price in the search drop-down menu.

Code sample

{% include molecule('suggestion-product', 'CatalogPage') with {
    data: {
        product: product,
        url: url,
        image: null,
        alt: 'alt',
        title: 'title',
        price: 'price',
        originalPrice: 'originalPrice'
    }
} only %}

defines.name: data
defines.contract:
{
    product: required,
    price: required,
    url: '',
    image: null,
    alt: '',
    title: '',
    originalPrice: null
}
